Table of Contents

Class IgnoredFileService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Concrete
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Class handling collection of IgnoredFile objects associated with the .md files ignored during merge, whose paths are stored as relative to connected main directory path.

Inheritance: BaseService<T> -> BaseDirectoryService<T> -> RelativeFileService<T> -> IgnoredFileService
Implements: ICRUDService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, IRelativeFileService<T>, IService<T> 

public sealed class IgnoredFileService : RelativeFileService<IgnoredFile>, IRelativeFileService<IgnoredFile>, IDirectoryService<IgnoredFile>, ICRUDService<IgnoredFile>, IService<IgnoredFile>
